bmi.title: BMI Calculator
bmi.metaDescription: Free BMI Calculator - Calculate your body mass index using metric or imperial system. Know your ideal healthy weight.

info.title: About BMI
info.description: Body Mass Index (BMI) is a measure of body weight based on a person's weight and height. It is calculated by dividing weight in kilograms by the square of height in meters.
info.limitations: BMI is a useful screening tool, but it does not diagnose body fatness or an individual's health. People with greater muscle mass may have a high BMI without excess fat.
